parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **500**.

parameters.name: RecordMatchType
parameters.description:
The match mode to filter the record names.

*   **fuzzy**: fuzzy match.
*   **prefix**: match by prefix.
*   **suffix**: match by suffix.
*   **exact** (default): exact match .

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID. You can call the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation to obtain the ID.
